description:
Rock some retro stripes while you sweat it out. These Athletic SMRTWL Retro Stripe Crew Socks deliver nonstop support on the arch and ankle thanks to the updated Smartwool 4 Degree fit system. Mesh zones add breathability to help stop sweaty feet in their tracks, plus a reinforced sole help keep these socks durable and always up for the challenge. Plus, no matter which way you move, these socks are designed never to slip or budge. Now that’s pretty rad.

  • Smartwool® 4 Degree fit system with elasticized arch and ankle support designed to keep the sock in place
  • Flat knit toe seam for additional comfort
  • Reinforced sole for additional durability
  • Virtually Seamless™ toe for enhanced comfort
  • Mesh zones for added breathability
name: Smartwool Athletic SMRTWL RetroStripe Crew Socks - Unisex
